sn45.32:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you one practicing wrongly and one practicing rightly.
sn45.32:4.5: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong samādhi.
sn45.32:4.7: This is called one practicing wrongly.
sn45.32:4.9: It’s someone who has right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
sn45.32:4.11: This is called one practicing rightly.”
